title: Laura Schiff Bean
text:
Laura Schiff Bean, born in New York state, is a contemporary visual artist. Prior to becoming a career artist, she earned a degree in psychology from <a href="George%20Washington%20University">George Washington University</a> and then worked in print advertising in <a href="Boston%2C%20MA">Boston, MA</a>. Laura Schiff Bean went on to get her Masters in Fine Arts (MFA) from <a href="School%20of%20the%20Museum%20of%20Fine%20Arts%20at%20Tufts">School of the Museum of Fine Arts at Tufts</a>. Her inspiration is derived from artists such as <a href="Lucian%20Freud">Lucien Freud</a>, <a href="Jenny%20Saville">Jenny Saville</a>, and <a href="Jim%20Dine">Jim Dine</a>.
Bean is known "for her dress 'portraits' painted with many layers of thick dripping paint." She tries to imbue the paintings with a sense of the wearer.
